metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7409 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The dbclient and server in Dropbear SSH before 2016.74, when compiled with DEBUG_TRACE, allows local users to read process memory via the -v argument, related to a failed remote ident.

criterions.comment: dropbear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
